baseline_groups.claim_summary: Mobile Disburse (MD) and Mobile Account (MA) treatments increase monthly business profits (earn_business) relative to cash control.
baseline_groups.notes: treatment2=MA, treatment3=MD. Primary claim is about MD. Both arms in same regression with strata FE and baseline outcome control.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: MD and MA treatments increase total savings (much_saved) relative to cash control.
baseline_groups.notes: Savings is a primary outcome. Neither MA nor MD significant in baseline.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: MD and MA treatments increase business capital relative to cash control.
baseline_groups.notes: Capital is a primary outcome. MD significant (p=0.004), MA not.

global_notes: 3-arm RCT. robust/se/hc1 and robust/control/baseline_only duplicate baselines. primary/* specs for much_saved and capital also duplicate baselines. Heterogeneity specs classified as non-core.
